title: China’s Envision launches 5MW onshore wind turbine for India
description: Chinese manufacturer Envision Energy launched a 5MW onshore wind turbine with a 182-metre rotor diameter in the Indian market, enhancing annual energy output by over 40%. With an investment of around ₹500 crores, Envision established significant manufacturing capacities in Pune and Trichy, creating over 2,500 jobs.
